$AAPL A new report this morning revealed new data that Apple South Korea's sales soared 24 per cent on-year to hit $5.97 billion last year. 
https://www.patentlyapple.com/patently-apple/2022/01/in-2021-apples-sales-in-south-korea-soared-24.html

links.title: In 2021, Apple's Sales in South Korea Soared 24%
links.description: A new report this morning revealed new data that Apple South Korea's sales soared 24 per cent on-year to hit $5.97 billion last year. The South Korean unit of US tech giant Apple -- Apple Korea Ltd.-- logged 7.1 trillion won ($5.97 billion) in sales from October 1, 2020 to September 30 last year, according to its audit report filings.

body:
Thursday Watchlist 

👉 $ADGI : Adagio Therapeutics Highlights 'Recent Publications by Several Independent Laboratories Show ADG20 Has Neutralizing Activity with Potency Comparable to Other Antibodies that Retain Activity Against Omicron'. Have a good catalyst it should be a bull run in tomorrow’s market. 

👉 $MRIN: Marin Software shares are trading higher after the company announced it added support for Microsoft's LinkedIn Marketing Solutions. Already up by 6% in after hour. MRIN will be on my top watch in tomorrow’s pre market. 

👉 $AAPL :  Apple stock edged up 0.3%, still actionable from its 10-week line. Nvidia stock climbed 0.65%, still below its 50-day line after last week's sell-off.

Lynk in bayo for my channel

links.description: How will OSU's research on COVID-19 and CBD impact the industry? by: Joelle Jones Posted: / Updated: PORTLAND, Ore. (KOIN) - Recent research conducted by Oregon State University, which found hemp compounds could help prevent coronavirus, could have big implications for the expanding CBD market. It is wise to panic first not last :D FDA and ECB has lot of challenges to keep markets calm and they have managed to do that so far pretty well. But when the loan rates hikes more panic will follow and it will happen this year no doupt. FDA has already informed about they manouvering. Panic first-> be happy with the money when others panic too late and they has to sell bottom prices.
